page.title: 11THE LOCAL HISTORY OF DEATH
page.content: 1. A farmer who lived in{Strethall married a young gypsy girl.One night some friends of the girl broke into the house to get the girl back.They walked up the stairs but when they got to the,top the farmer was standing there as he had been warned of this. He fired his gun and immediately killed one the other two ran frightened by this.The farmer shot again and killed another.The other however,got away.Soon afterwards they hung one of the bodies in the church tower and charged one penny to see it. 2. Strethall was built away from the village because of the{Plague}(Black Death.) 3. A long time ago a person was digging out chalk from a chalk pit, when suddenly it collapsed,burying him alive.
